tweets.text: A lot of rumours on social media claiming certain products, practices can prevent or cure #Ebola. They are false, their use can be dangerous
Sept. 5 workshop - Clinical Dev. of Drugs to Prevent Infections Caused by S. aureus in Healthcare Setting http://t.co/UImjGC03l3
Foreign Affairs Council conclusions on the #Ebola crisis in West Africa are now available: http://t.co/GhrC4aCQqB.
Existing supplies of all experimental #Ebola medicines are extremely limited or exhausted
For most, administering experimental #Ebola medicines & vaccines is difficult and demanding, some requires facilities for intensive care
Evidence of experimental #Ebola medicines & vaccines are suggestive but not based on solid scientific data from clinical trials
Experimental #Ebola medicines and vaccines are not yet been tested in humans and are not approved by regulatory authorities
Recent intense media coverage on experimental vaccines for #ebola is creating some unrealistic expectations
